Name: Shadow Jump
About the game: Can you reach the top? Shadow Jump is a punishing platformer where a single mistake can be devastating. However through a bit of creativity and a lot of patience, success is only a matter of time... Gameplay Charge rockets by holding left click, the resulting explosion will propel your character in the opposite direction. Rockets can be charged midair to chain jumps together, allowing for creative routes up each level. But be careful... not all platforms are alike Levels Explore six ambient levels as you ascend, each with a unique theme and unique challenges. Mastery of each level is key, as certain mistakes may force you to repeat them.
